div.p: Translation: from P.Oxy. 2 To Chaereas, strategus, from Cerinthus, slave of Antonia, daughter of Drusus. I wish to transfer from the Oxyrhynchite to the Cynopolite nome for the sake of pasturage 320 sheep and 160 goats and the lambs and kids that may be produced, which I have on the register in the Oxyrhynchite nome in the present ninth year of Tiberius Caesar Augustus. I therefore present this memorandum in order that you may write to the strategus of the Cynopolite nome to register the aforesaid sheep and goats. I, Cerinthus, slave of Antonia, daughter of Drusus, have presented this in the ninth year of Tiberius Caesar Augustus, on the eighth day of Mechir.
